<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Document</title>
</head>
<body>
    <section>
        <div>
            <figure class="wrd">
                <img src="data:image/jpeg;base64," alt="">
                <figcaption>
                 <h2>WEDNESDAY</h2>
                <p>Wednesday is an American supernatural mystery comedy <br>television series based on the character Wednesday Addams by Charles Addams</b> </p>
            </figcaption>
            </figure>
            <link rel="stylesheet" href="pro5.css">
        </div>
    </section>
</body>
</html>

.wrd{
    position:relative;
    overflow:hidden;
    border-radius:10px;
    box-shadow:0.6px 20px white;
    cursor:pointer;
    transition:transform 0.3s ease;
}
.wrd img{
    width:180px;
    height:170px;
    margin-left:150px;
    display:block;
    border-radius:10px;
    transition: transform 0.5s ease;
}
.wrd figcaption{
    position:absolute;
    inset:0;
    background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0.65);
    color:#fff;
    display:flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    justify-content: center;
    

}
